appName.description: The title of the application, displayed in the web store.

appDesc.message: Import friends birthdays from facebook to your favorite calendar.
appDesc.description: The description of the application, displayed in the web store.

FACEBOOK_REQUIRED_REGEXP.description: Allowed Facebook urls regexp to validate url

SCAN_ERROR_FACEBOOK_REQUIRED.message:
You need to be on a facebook page in order to generate calendar.

Please follow the link below and click the icon again.
SCAN_ERROR_FACEBOOK_REQUIRED.description: Description in case user is not on a facebook page

NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE_TITLE.description: Title for modal in case facebook language is not supported

NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE.message:
Your facebook language is not supported.
Please change it to:
$languages$
And click the icon again.
NOT_SUPPORTED_LANGUAGE.description: Description in case facebook language is not supported

CHANGE_FACEBOOK_LANGUAGE_LINK.description: Facebook settings page with language set.

CHANGE_FACEBOOK_LANGUAGE_LINK_TITLE.description: Button to facebook settings page title.

DONE_DESCRIPTION.message:
Your calendar is ready for import.
Please leave a feedback if you found it helpful :o)
DONE_DESCRIPTION.description: Description when extraction process successfully finished

DONE_TITLE.description: Title when extraction process successfully finished

SCAN_ERROR_NO_TOKEN_DETECTED.message: Unable to fetch birthdays data, make sure you are logged into Facebook and try again.
SCAN_ERROR_NO_TOKEN_DETECTED.description: Description for error when no token found.

SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_ICS.description: Label for ics file type radio button

SELECT_ICS_DESCRIPTION.message: ICS is a universal calendar format used by Microsoft Outlook, Google Calendar, and Apple Calendar.
SELECT_ICS_DESCRIPTION.description: Description for ics file type radio button

CREATE_ICS_SETTINGS_ONE_EVENT_PER_DAY.description: Label for `create or delete ics` settings - single event per day

CREATE_ICS_SETTINGS_ALL_DAY_EVENTS.description: Label for `create or delete ics` settings - all day events

SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_CSV.description: Label for csv file type radio button

FILE_FORMAT_CSV_DESCRIPTION.message: CSV file format used by Microsoft Excel or Google Sheets. DO NOT USE it to import birthdays to a calendar, ICS format is preferable.
FILE_FORMAT_CSV_DESCRIPTION.description: Description for label for csv file type radio button

CREATE_CSV_SETTINGS_DATE_FORMAT.description: Label for csv settings `date format` label.

CREATE_CSV_SETTINGS_DATE_FORMAT_DAY_MONT.description: Label for csv settings `date format` Day/Month label.

CREATE_CSV_SETTINGS_DATE_FORMAT_MONTH_DA.description: Label for csv settings `date format` Month/Day label.

SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_DELETE_ICS.message: Delete imported ICS from Google Calendar.
SELECT_FILE_FORMAT_DELETE_ICS.description: Label for delete-ics file type radio button

SELECT_DELETE_ICS_DESCRIPTION.message: Special ICS file used to remove previously imported events from Google Calendar. Import it to the calendar same way as original ICS import.
SELECT_DELETE_ICS_DESCRIPTION.description: Description for delete-ics file type radio button

ENABLE_BADGE.description: Label for checkbox to display today's birthdays.

TODAY_BIRTHDAY_TITLE.description: Header text above list of birthdays

TODAY_NO_BIRTHDAYS_TITLE.description: Header text above list of birthdays when no birthdays for today

SCAN_LOG_PROCESS_STARTED.description: Message send the moment scan process has been initiated.

SCAN_LOG_CHECK_LOGIN.message: Checking for Facebook login and language.
SCAN_LOG_CHECK_LOGIN.description: Message send before checking facebook login and language.

SCAN_LOG_CHECK_LOGIN_ERROR_LOGIN.description: Error message send when user is not logged in to Facebook.

SCAN_LOG_CHECK_LOGIN_ERROR_LANGUAGE.description: Error message send not supported facebook login detected.

SCAN_LOG_CHECK_SUCCESS.message: Facebook login and language are fine.
SCAN_LOG_CHECK_SUCCESS.description: Message when facebook login and language are fine.

SCAN_LOG_REQUEST_FACEBOOK_ERROR.description: Error when failed to fetch birthdays data while making request to Facebook.

SCAN_LOG_PREPARING_REQUESTS.description: Message that script preparing to execute requests to facebook.

SCAN_LOG_REQUEST_WITH_NUMBER.description: Scan message with each request to facebook.

SCAN_LOG_REQUESTS_DONE.message: All the requests to Facebook were successfully executed.
SCAN_LOG_REQUESTS_DONE.description: Message send when all request to facebook been successfully executed.

SCAN_LOG_EXTRACTING_BIRTHDAYS_DATA.description: Message send before extraction of the birthdays process started.

SCAN_LOG_STORING_EXTRACTED_BIRTHDAYS.message: Storing extracted data for further usage.
SCAN_LOG_STORING_EXTRACTED_BIRTHDAYS.description: Message send before storing extracted birthdays to local storage.

SCAN_LOG_PROCESS_DONE.description: Message send after extraction process is done.
